thread.title: MCA's charity foundation helps the needy from Negri
thread.title_full: MCA's charity foundation helps the needy from Negri

author: SIMON KHOO
title: MCA's charity foundation helps the needy from Negri

persons.name: datuk seri dr lim chin fui

text:
by simon khoo Dr Lim ﻿(in checked shirt) with the God of Prosperity and aid recipients from Teluk Kemang during the CNY event in Wisma MCA. 
MORE than 60 people from poor families in Negri Sembilan got an early festive cheer when they were given goodies and cash to usher in the Year of the Rooster. 
They were from the districts of Teluk Kemang, Rasah and Seremban and were registered with the state Welfare Department. 
The initiative was a yearly activity by the 1MCA Foundation to ease the burden of the needy. 
Present at the function was Negri Sembilan MCA chairman Datuk Seri Dr Lim Chin Fui, who is also the Teluk Kemang MCA division chief. 
Dr Lim said MCA would continue to do its best to serve the people of all races. 
“With the present economic situation, more people are facing difficulties to make ends meet. 
“As a political party fighting for the rights and looking after the welfare of the people, we will do all we can to help the needy and less fortunate,” he told StarMetro . 
Dr Lim said state members and leaders have been told to look out and provide for the needy, regardless of race. 
He urged corporate bodies to chip in and help the Government in creating a caring and sharing society. 
MCA vice-president Datin Paduka Chew Mei Fun was present to hand over the items to the recipients. 
Two staff members dressed up as God of Prosperity and Panda Bear to bring cheer to the children. 
The crowd was also entertained with festive songs and a magic show.
